name: poc-feature-modules
description: A POC of composite app (shell + feature modules)

scripts.dev: npx run-p dev:app dev:core dev:feature1 dev:feature2 dev:feature3
scripts.dev:core: npx lerna exec --scope @pocfm/core --stream -- npm run build:watch
scripts.dev:feature1: npx lerna exec --scope @pocfm/feature1 --stream -- npm run build:watch
scripts.dev:feature2: npx lerna exec --scope @pocfm/feature2 --stream -- npm run build:watch
scripts.dev:feature3: npx lerna exec --scope @pocfm/feature3 --stream -- npm run build:watch
